backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profiles and daily fitness entries with access control, storage mixins, and CRUD operations including date-based comparisons.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a specific CalendarView heading update and its associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten short summaries of all major frontend files describing UI behavior, data flow, and feature responsibilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining OKLCH-based light/dark theme variables and global base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app root and main script with dark mode preset.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level app component handling authentication, profile setup flow, theming, and global toast configuration.
frontend/src/components/AboutView.tsx: About page component presenting feature descriptions and navigation back action using cards and icons.
frontend/src/components/AnalyticsView.ts: Analytics dashboard building charts for weight, body fat, measurements, workout duration, and heatmaps using queried backend data.
frontend/src/components/CalendarView.tsx: Renders a calendar view that highlights days with saved entries and opens detail or comparison modals on selection.
frontend/src/components/CameraCapture.ts: Provides a camera interface with lens preference, zoom handling, error normalization, and photo capture for saving images.
frontend/src/components/compare/CompareD: Empty or placeholder file for a date picker modal used in comparison views.
frontend/src/components/compare/CompareS: Header component for a comparison slot showing date, variance badge, and a button to open a calendar.
frontend/src/components/DayDetailView.ts: Displays and edits a day's entry including measurements, workouts, and photos, with camera capture and upload support.
frontend/src/components/MainLayout.tsx: Defines the main app layout with navigation between calendar, analytics, profile, and about views.
frontend/src/components/PhotoComparisonV: Shows side‑by‑side photo comparisons across three selectable dates with variance and date offset calculations.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for creating a user profile with name, age, gender, and unit preferences, saving via API.
frontend/src/components/ProfileView.tsx: React component for viewing and editing the user's profile, handling form state, save actions, and logout.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, login state, and stored identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks wrapping backend queries and mutations for profiles, entries, and measurements.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with theming variables, dark mode settings, and custom UI styles including calendar indicators.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders the login landing page with branding, feature highlights, and a login button using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/utils/cameraErrorMapping.ts: Normalizes camera-related errors into consistent categories with user-friendly messages and blocking flags.
Attempts to select a standard rear camera using device heuristics while avoiding problematic environments like Android Chrome PWAs.
frontend/src/utils/pwa.ts: Provides PWA and environment detection utilities, including checks for installed PWAs and Android Chrome PWAs.
frontend/src/utils/time.ts: Utility functions for converting dates to and from backend nanosecond timestamps and formatting or comparing dates.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles URL parameter parsing, session persistence, and safe removal of parameters from hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config enabling dark mode, custom color tokens, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing app purpose, versioning, and a detailed list of implemented features with IDs, descriptions, and synonyms.
